testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.testimonial_1_quote: INOSX agents cut our processing time by 60% in the first month. The ROI was immediate and continues to grow.
testimonials.testimonial_2_quote: The knowledge management solution transformed how our team accesses information. What used to take hours now takes seconds.

services.title: AI Services
services.intro: INOSX builds practical, production-grade AI solutions that transform data, processes, and systems into measurable outcomes. Our portfolio blends automation, analytics, security, and multi-agent orchestration to drive efficiency, innovation, and competitiveness.

ai_agents.title: INOSX AI Agents
ai_agents.description: Autonomous agents that eliminate repetitive work and connect platforms end‚Äëto‚Äëend.
ai_agents.capability_1: Auto-integration with ERPs, CRMs, databases, and APIs
ai_agents.capability_2: End-to-end process execution with error reduction
ai_agents.capability_4: Continuous learning and adaptation to business needs

security.title: INOSX CyberAI Security
security.capability_1: Continuous monitoring across systems and networks

knowledge.title: INOSX Knowledge Agents
knowledge.description: Document- and knowledge-centric agents for internal repositories.
knowledge.capability_1: Automatic indexing and reading of corporate documents
knowledge.capability_2: Contextual, semantic search over knowledge bases
knowledge.capability_3: Integrations with SharePoint, Confluence, Google Drive, and more
knowledge.benefit_1: Less time spent searching for information

orchestration.title: INOSX AI Orchestration
orchestration.description: Orchestrates complex workflows across multiple AI agents.
orchestration.capability_2: Integrates ERP, CRM, customer support, and operations
orchestration.capability_3: Full governance and traceability of executions
orchestration.benefit_3: Flexibility to evolve with business strategy

vision.title: INOSX Vision Robotics
vision.description: Advanced robotic solutions powered by 3D vision and visual language models for autonomous operations.
vision.capability_2: Visual language model integration for natural interaction
vision.capability_4: Real-time decision making with computer vision
vision.benefit_2: Reduced human intervention in complex tasks

services.value_text: With INOSX solutions, your organization partners with AI‚Äînot just uses it. Our products reduce costs, increase efficiency, democratize data access, protect digital assets, and orchestrate complex processes at scale‚Äîcreating a faster, safer, and more competitive business.
